title: Queen Of Cards
overview: The genius young girl Lin Que's father, known as the "King of Sparrows," was murdered. After growing up, she seeks revenge for her father by deliberately approaching the mysterious tycoon, Ninth Master, intending to use him for her vengeance. Ninth Master is looking for a game prodigy to compete in the Sparrow God Tournament on his behalf. The two start off using each other, but gradually fall in love in the process—until Lin Que mistakenly believes that Ninth Master is the murderer who killed her father, leading them into a love-hate entanglement…
